name: Cleaver
description: Very high damage but very slow attack speed.<size=20><color=#808080>Who needs brains when you have a sword this size!?</color></size>

name: Warrior
description: An all-round fighter with average health and damage.<size=20><color=#808080>Always first on the front lines, but never alone for long.</color></size>

name: Plasma Marines
description: Ranged Minions with average damage, speed and health.<size=20><color=#808080>When you crash-land on a strange planet, there's only one rule: Shoot first.</color></size>

name: Grenadier
description: Damages groups of ground enemies.<size=20><color=#808080>He set out to make a hair balm, but it somehow turned out so potent it's lethal! Still does wonders for shine and volume, though.</color></size>

name: Lightning Bolt
description:
Destroy a random enemy Minion or Building.Blink and you'll miss it...
'cause you'll be dead.

name: Living Statue
description: Only attacks Buildings.<size=20><color=#808080>It's said that if you pick a flower within Apep's mighty gardens, the statues come to life to defend its beauty.</color></size>

name: Dragon Whelp
description:
Can fly, which is good against melee ground Minions.Part dragon.
Part demon.
All cuteness.

name: Scrat Pack
description: Good for taking bridges and as cheap targets.<size=20><color=#808080>Scrats are the pest of the arenas, no matter how many you kill there always seem to be more.</color></size>

name: Ghost Turret
description: Defensive Building with good damage and attack speed.On death, give a random friendly Minion Spirit.

name: Fireball
description: Deals damage to enemies in the area.<size=20><color=#808080>Great against groups of low to medium health enemies.</color></size>

name: Boomer
description:
Hatches from an Egg after a short delay.
The Boomer explodes on contact or death. Voidborne Wound : Reduce Mana cost by 1.

name: Swarmers
description: Swarmers are fast and have decent damage but low health.<size=20><color=#808080>Swarmers might be blind, but they'll always smell your fear.</color></size>

name: Succubus
description: Netherstep backwards when damaged by melee attackers.The dark sorceresses of Shars'Rakk are able to step through the fabric of reality to safety.

name: Swarmer Totem
description: Summons groups of Swarmers over time.

name: Demon Warrior
description: From the 5th time this card is played and beyond, Demon Warrior has triple health and damage.

name: Cannon Roller
description: Rolls backwards when it fires.

name: Ghost
description:
Possesses an enemy, turning it to your side.
The enemy becomes Cursed.

name: Last Stand
description: Summons 5 Legionnaires.If your opponent controls both bridges, summon 7 instead.

name: Sniper Scrat
description: Very long range and good damage, but takes a while to aim.

name: Soul Stealer
description: Soul Steal.Only the most fanatical Slitherbound are granted insight into the cruel arts of the Slither Lords.

name: Bridge Shrine
description: Generates [math:[av:BridgeShrine.LifeTime]/[math:[v:GeneratePowerOverTime.POWER_DELAY]/1000]] XP over [av:BridgeShrine.LifeTime] seconds.When in Mana Frenzy the shrine takes [v:TakeDamageOverTimeExtraDuringManaFrenzy.OVERHEAT_MULTIPLIER]x decay damage.

name: Assassin
description: Stealth.Deals triple damage when attacking while Stealthed.

name: Blind Date
description: Summons a random 5-mana minion card.

name: Divine Warrior
description: Divine Shield.Though she failed her trials with the Chapel of Light, she still picked up a few tricks.

name: Scrat Horde
description: Summons a horde of small Scrats.

name: Mana Puff
description: When on a bridge it generates 1 mana every 10 sec.

name: Defenso Chopper
description: When hit by melee attackers, it deals 75 counter damage and Stuns them for 3 seconds.

name: Banner Man
description: Grants a Shield to 5 nearby Friendly Minions.Empyrean banner men spark hope in the followers of the light, and fear in its enemies.

name: Healing Fireball
description: Heals all friendly minions in the area.<size=20><color=#808080>Yes, it is a HEALING fireball...</color></size>

name: Shock Rock
description: Stuns and damages enemies in the area.

name: Stun Blast
description: Stuns enemies in the area.

name: Wizard Puff
description: If it dies, transform a random enemy Minion or Building into a friendly Mana Puff.

name: Priestess
description: She will constantly heal a nearby damaged friendly Minion.

name: Re-Boomer
description:
Hatches from an Egg after a short delay.
As a Boomer it explodes on contact or death, but turns back into an egg.

name: Colossus
description: Swipes enemies in a huge arc in front of it.<size=20><color=#808080>This lumbering hunk of evil is probably the best at what it does.</color></size>

name: Beam of DOOM!
description: Deals massive damage in a small area.<size=20><color=#808080>A popular UFO weapon.</color></size>

name: Laser Turret
description: When staying on the same target, it fires faster and faster.

name: Whirly Scrat
description: Deals damage in an area around himself.<size=20><color=#808080>Has a hard time socializing.</color></size>

name: Illusory Cleaver
description: Summons an illusion of a Cleaver with little health and no damage - but it explodes when killed for 10 damage!Illusory Cleaver looks like a Cleaver to your opponent.

name: Troubadour
description: Taunt .Revelry: give nearby enemy Minions Slow.He only ever learned one song, but to compensate he plays it constantly.

name: Snake Druid
description: Call Slitherbound.His attacks immobilize enemies for 6 seconds.

name: Dragon Pack
description:
3 Dragon Whelps.
Highly effective against melee ground Minions.A devastating pack of flying evil.
And cuteness

name: Scrat Launcher
description: Massive range, always shoots at the nearest enemy building.<size=20><color=#808080>Scrats go in; screaming, rocket-powered balls of fur come out.</color></size>

name: Drone Walker
description: Solid ranged attacker with no fear.

name: Legionnaires
description: A tough group of melee fighters.

name: Harbinger
description: Has an extremely long range and causes knock-back.<size=20><color=#808080>Wields the most powerful magic of the Slither Lords, but his slavedriving days have taught him to let others do the rushing.</color></size>

name: Annihilator
description:
Deals damage in a large area.This is as big as guns get.
Yes, it does area damage.

name: Stun Lancers
description: Attacks Stuns enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Disruptor Puff
description: While on a bridge, teleport to the other bridge every 6 seconds.

name: Dragon Nest
description: Summons a Flightless Dragon when you play a Spell.Summons a Dragon Whelp instead if the Spell cost 4+ mana.

name: Crossbow Guild
description: Summons Crossbow Dudes over time.

name: Future Past
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with a random 1-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 1.

name: Call To Arms
description: Summon a Warrior by your Master Tower and replace each of your non-master Buildings with a Warrior.

name: Blood Imps
description: Your Master takes damage equal to the damage they take - even overkill damage.<size=20><color=#808080>Even in death they're annoying.</color></size>

name: Trick Swap
description: Swaps the location of ALL minions on both bridges and Stuns enemies for 4 seconds. Stuns Stunned Units are unable to move or attack.

name: Crossbow Dudes
description: Cheap ranged support with low health and damage.

name: Black Hole
description: Sucks up ALL minions in an area, removing them from the board for the rest of the spell's duration.

name: Burn The Bridges
description: Both bridges get covered in flames, dealing damage to ground Minions.Damage: 200Duration: 5 seconds.

name: Tombstone
description: Place a Tombstone that resurrects the next minion under your command that dies, after a delay.

name: Infiltration
description: Summon 4 Plasma Marines anywhere in the Arena.

name: Daggerfall
description: Deals low damage in a large area.<size=20><color=#808080>Great against hordes of low health enemies, such as Scrats!</color></size>

name: Bounty Sniper
description: Gives you 2 XP whenever it kills a Minion or damages the enemy Master.Gain Shield if you have less XP than your opponent.

name: Blastmancer
description: When attacking an enemy that dies, perform Soul Detonate.

name: Styxi
description: Stealth.If Styxi attacks a target but doesn't kill it, he'll stop attacking for 5 seconds.

name: Gax the World Bomb
description:
Hatches from an Egg after a short delay.
On contact or death, he blows up to deal damage to EVERYTHING.

name: Rammer
description:
Moves fast and only attacks Buildings.He hates buildings for some reason.
Efficient at deconstruction!

name: Zeppelin Bomber
description: Flies over the battlefield towards enemy Master Tower and drops bombs every 3 seconds along the way.

name: Blue Golem
description: Has high health and high damage.<size=20><color=#808080>Hard as a rock, both physically and emotionally.</color></size>

name: Rampage
description: Gives friendly Minions Rage.A vial of unbridled malice from a thousand demons, with a hint of lime.

name: Heal Puff
description: When on a bridge it heals your Master for 25 health per second.

name: Red Golem
description: Summon a Blue Golem.If you have 50% or less health, summon a Red Golem instead.

name: Scrat Tank
description: When not attacking, the Scrat Tank becomes completely immune to damage and stuns.

name: Raging Reinforcements
description: Summons a Dragon Whelp or a Warrior or 4 Crossbow Dudes and gives them Rage.

name: Wall
description: Lots of health, but no attack.<size=20><color=#808080>A perfect distraction for building haters.</color></size>

name: Spiritmancer
description: When attacking an enemy that dies, perform Soul Rip.

name: Undying Skeleton
description: Leaves an Undying Corpse the first time it dies.

name: Walking Blind Date
description: Taunt , Rush.When killed, it summons a random 4 mana Minion card.

name: Propeller Scrats
description: Quick and weak flying melee Minions.<size=20><color=#808080>Just like normal Scrats - except they tied propellers to their tails!</color></size>

name: Tranquil Shi-Hou
description: Heals himself when no enemies are near.<size=20><color=#808080>Not a fan of monkey business.</color></size>

name: Battle Shi-Hou
description: Attacks faster for each enemy within range (Max 250% bonus for 5 enemies).<size=20><color=#808080>A big fan of monkey business.</color></size>

name: Chain Lightning
description: Damages and Stuns , then jumps to a nearby enemy up to 10 times.

name: Spear Throwers
description: Their first attack is a ranged spear with double damage.

name: Guardian
description: Absorbs all damage dealt to nearby Crystal Elf Minions.

name: Shield Totem
description: Summon a Shield Totem that makes the Master Tower immune to damage.

name: Blast Entry
description: Settsu enters the battlefield and deals damage to nearby enemies on impact.Damage: [sv:BlastEntry.Damage]Shield Health: [av:SettsuMinion.MaxHealth]

name: Spirit Vessel
description: Gives a random friendly Minion Spirit when killed.

name: Xiao Long
description: Each time an opponent casts a Spell, Xiao Long gains Rage, Haste and Shield.

name: Bazooka Scrat
description: Only attacks buildings.<size=20><color=#808080>To the untrained eye it might look like he only carries one rocket, but maybe that eye just doesn't understand Scrat technology, okay?!</color></size>

name: Hypnotize
description: [actorskillinfo:Cohort,[mec:[r:Cohort]]] ([cv:Hypnotize.Variable]).For the duration Enemy Minions attack random friendly units within range, if able.

name: Magma Storm
description:
Calls down 10 magma rocks in a large area.
Also deals damage to friendly Units.

name: Spirit Infusion
description: Gives 3 random friendly Minions Spirit over 9 seconds.Accursed Ascension: Gives an extra Spirit.

name: Arcane Missiles
description: Fires a volley of arcane missiles in the selected direction.Damage: 150

name: Arcane Golem
description: When you cast a spell, it gains +40 health and +6 damage

name: Fire Imp
description: Leaves fire on the ground that deals heavy damage to ground Minions in the area.<size=20><color=#808080>A pyromaniac who loves to incinerate his enemies.</color></size>

name: Future Present
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with a random 2-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 2.

name: Shielded Crossbow Dudes
description:
[actorskillinfo:SingleShieldBuff,[mec:[r:SingleShieldBuff]]].If you do not control any bridges summon [cv:ShieldedCrossbowDudes.SummonAmounts*0] extra.[f:Still a group of weak ranged Minions.
Still great friends.]

name: Prowler
description:
Jumps at enemies at range, dealing double damage.This monster was bred to hunt.
It is well known for pouncing on unsuspecting enemies.

name: Elite Swarmer
description: A fast and somewhat durable monster.

name: S.T.INT
description:
Fast and cheap ranged Minion.The Single-Track Interceptor - or S.T.INT - packs quite a punch for its size.
Can't take much in return though.

name: Drone Buzzers
description: Versatile but weak flying Minions.<size=20><color=#808080>Known as Buzzers because they're small and irritating, and a good swat takes care of them.</color></size>

name: "Armored" Scrats
description: Barrel Shield.These Scrats are surprisingly hardy, maybe they're not just regular Scrats wearing a barrel.

name: More Dakka!
description:
Ratbo fires a minigun salvo at the nearest enemy.
It deals more damage for each friendly Minion in the arena.Damage per Minion: 40Delay: 1 secondsDeals reduced damage to Masters

name: Commander Azali
description: When you take a bridge, Azali grants Shield to all friendly ground Minions.Big and strong, the Commander will show the way!

name: AtG Drone x8
description:
A tough but slow flier with only Air-to-Ground weaponry.
Shoots 7 projectiles at random nearby targets.

name: Healing Shrine
description: Heals all nearby friendly minions over time.

name: Combustion
description:
Stun affected friendly Minions.
After a delay they explode, dealing damage to themselves and nearby Enemies.

name: Musketeer
description: Call Slitherbound.Deflects melee attackers, then ripostes for double damage.

name: Morgrul the Swarmer King
description: On Summon and on Death, Morgrul roars and calls 3 Swarmers to his side, damages and knock enemies back.

name: Scott The Sensitive Savage
description:
Will Cry at 50% health.Though a fierce fighter, Scott is also a little emotional.
Don't worry though, he'll be ok and back in the fight soon enough!

name: Flightless Dragons
description:
Vulnerable, but with extremely high damage.Baby dragons play rough.
Unfortunately, angering your big sister could make her take a bite out of your wing.

name: Gor'Rakk Sacrifice
description: Stuns a random friendly Minion for 5 seconds, then kills it to summon a Cleaver.Keep the sacrifice alive or lose it!

name: Bridge Buddies
description: Summon a Scrat on both bridges.If you already own the bridge, the Scrat gains Barrel Shield.

name: Cursebearer
description: Cursed Aura.Reanimated in the pits of the Cursed Tundra, this forgotten soul leaves a trail of decay in its wake.

name: Magma Cannon
description: Fires flaming balls of magma at enemies in range.<size=20><color=#808080>For when you need more firepower.</color></size>

name: Lost Legionnaires
description: Empyrean Army: Gain Rage.They may be lost from their battalion, but these two hardy soldiers are great when you just need a couple extra.

name: Gambler's Ball
description: Casts either a Healing Fireball, Fireball or in rare cases, both!Like a certain serpent once said; "Luck iss a ssskill".

name: Ravenous Swarmers
description: If the last card you played was a Spell, they gain Rage and Haste.

name: Screaming Scrat
description: Taunt , Rush.Moves toward enemy master until it Explodes and deals damage to ALL nearby Units.

name: Gor'Rakk Brutes
description: Summons a Cleaver, but if the last card you played was a [cv:DynamicDuo.AdditionalUnitTriggerVariable]-mana Spell, also summons a Rammer.

name: Netherstep
description: Teleports friendly ground Minions in the area along the path to the enemy Master. Voidborne Wound : Reduce Mana cost by 1.The Shars'Rakk love sharing their magic - and other things...

name: Incubus
description: Netherstep towards enemy ranged attackers.

name: Brutish Betrayer
description: Only attacks buildings.Has Turncoat and Rage.

name: Shars'Rakk Twins
description:
Summon an Incubus.
If the last card you played was a 5+ Mana Spell, also summon a Succubus.

name: Dragon Ball
description: It's a fireball, but if the last card you played was a Minion of cost 5 or more, it also summons a Dragon Whelp where it lands!

name: A.I.M. Bot
description: Marksmanship, Shield.This drone has the Automated Intelligent Murder system upgrade.

name: Sniper Squad
description: Very long range, but takes a long time to load.<size=20><color=#808080>Sometimes less is more, but when it comes to big guns that's definitely not the case!</color></size>

name: Cheese Date
description: Summons a random 3-mana Scrat Minion card and give it Rage.

name: Sun Burn
description: Give all Minions in a small area Rage and deal 10 damage 10 times to enemies.

name: Clear Skies
description: Heals all Minions and Masters for 250 health and removes Shield and Rage.

name: Rabid Prowler
description: Call Slitherbound.Sacrifice: Gain Rage if you sacrificed at least 1 Slitherbound.

name: Tantrum Throwers
description:
Summon [cv:RageThrowers.SummonAmount] SpearThrowers, If you do not control any bridges summon [cv:RageThrowers.SummonAmounts*0] extra.
They all gain [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]].

name: Propeller Horde
description: If a friendly minion has [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]], summon [cv:PropellerHorde.SummonAmounts*0] more.

name: Empowered Soul Stealer
description: Soul Steal,Call Slitherbound.Starts with 2 Souls.If a friendly Minion has Rage, gain 2 more.

name: Crystal Archers
description: Mana SurgeFragile, but deadly at long range.

name: Crystal Arcanist
description: Mana Surge.Deals damage to groups of enemies.She's read the books of the Crystal Spire for 216 years, now it's time to let loose! And boy is it fun to blow up groups of enemies!

name: Arcane Bolt
description: Mana Freeze (1). Stuns the highest health ground Minion in an area.If it has 500 or less Health while stunned, Destroy it.

name: Crystal Sentry
description:
Mana Surge.A versatile ranged fighter.The Sentries of the Crystal Spire train for centuries to master their deadly glaives.
They might save time by using a less complicated weapon, but where's the fun in that?

name: Armored Escort
description: Summons 2 Crystal Sentries with Mana Surge to escort the next Ranged Minion you play.No, not that kind of escort.

name: Crystal Construct
description: Gain 1 Mana on death.<size=20><color=#808080>The Crystal Constructs act as both shield and stockpile for the magically dependent elven army.</color></size>

name: Lord-Sentinel Thelec
description: Mana Surge.If you have 4 Spells in your deck, also summon 6 Crystal Archers.The Lord-Sentinel truly leads from the front.

name: Mana Puff Madness
description: Summons 4 Mana Puffs at the Master Tower for each team.You can never quite know Puffs will do when they appear - besides look cute!

name: Wheel Of Doom
description:
Hits ALL ground target in a line 2 times.
If something survives both hits, the Wheel breaks.Invented by a madman and infused with magic.

name: Nether Bat
description: Will sometimes Netherstep towards a random enemy Minion.In the void, their sense of direction is impeccable.

name: Wolf Among Sheep
description:
Summon [cv:WolfAmongSheep.SummonAmount] Legionair.
One of them gains [actorskillinfo:LycanthropyBuff,[mec:[r:LycanthropyBuff]]] at random.

name: Once Bitten
description: Give a random friendly ground Minion in the area Lycanthropy.Can only be played in your own arena.

name: Bats Bats Bats!
description:
For the next 5 seconds summon 1 Nether Bat for each mana you spend.
Playing it again only prolong duration.Much like mosquitoes, Netherbats are annoying alone, but terrifying in a swarm!

name: Grasping Thorns
description: Slows enemies to 2 speed and deals damage in an area.Can only be cast in your own arena.

name: Lone Wolf
description: Rage.If there are no other Friendly Minions when this Warrior is summoned, she gains Lycanthropy.

name: Crossbow Trap
description: Fires bolts at nearby minions.DPS: [math:[av:CrossbowTrap.Damage]/[av:CrossbowTrap.AttackCooldown]]Health: [av:CrossbowTrap.MaxHealth]Duration: [av:CrossbowTrap.LifeTime] secondsWhen used, this card becomes a [r:DionaDecoyTrap]

name: Decoy Trap
description: Taunts nearby minionsHealth: [av:DecoyTrap.MaxHealth]Duration: [av:DecoyTrap.LifeTime] secWhen used, this card becomes a [r:DionaCrossBowTrap].

name: Howling Moon
description: Reduce all minions to 50% health and summon 2 Werewolves by your Master Tower.

name: Bahra the Witchwolf
description: When summoned, Bahra immobilizes all enemy ground Minions for 6 seconds.<size=20><color=#808080>His powerful moonbeams spell doom for groups of enemies.</color></size>

name: Shieldguard Of Light
description: Armor of Light, Shield Slam.Having an Armor of Light doesn't stop this overly cautious Brother from bringing a shield into battle.

name: Brothers Of Light
description: Armor of Light.From the Chapter of Light, the very elite of the Empyrean army.

name: Squire Puff
description: Once on the bridge, it gives 3 friendly ground Minions Shield every 10 seconds.Empyrean Army: Give 5 Minions Shield instead.

name: Gor'Rakk Gate
description: Open a portal to the void and Summon either of the following with Turncoat: - 7x Swarmers, - 2x Dragon Whelps, - 1x Cleaver

name: Crakgul Doomcleaver
description: When killing a Minion or hitting the enemy Master, reduce the mana cost of a random voidborne Card in hand by 1 until it is played.<size=20><color=#808080>Crakgul inspires his demon brethren with a celebration of killing.</color></size>

name: Morgrul's Ragers
description: Voidborne Wound : When Morgrul's Ragers are Summoned, all friendly Minions gain Rage.The savagery of Morgrul's elites inspires others to murder a little harder.

name: Shadow Whelp
description: Stealth.Deals triple damage when attacking while Stealthed.

name: Caeleth Dawnhammer
description: Armor of Light.Gain Divine Shield when Armor of Light activates.Empyrean Army: gain Taunt .

name: Stormy
description: Shoots Chain Lightning at enemies, damaging itself in the process.Zen-Chi Flow: Double Stormy's health.

name: Shen Stormstrike
description:
Stuns for 2 seconds.
If enemy is already stunned, he instead unleashes a powerful blast.Zen-Chi Flow: Stun all nearby enemies when played for 3 seconds.

name: Poison Strike
description: Inflicts Poison to all enemies in the area.Shower your enemies with the noxious fluids of Akinlep the Tainted today!

name: Jungle Jumble
description: Remove this card and shuffle 3 Zen-Chi cards into your deck.They gain Growthburst Shroom.

name: Zap Shrine
description: Stuns the closest enemy for 2 seconds.Zen-Chi Flow: Stun all enemies within range for 3 seconds when played.

name: Rock Rivals
description: Taunt .When first summoned, also summon an enemy Living Statue at opponent's Master Tower with Haste.

name: Skeleton Horde
description: Skeletons are scrawny fighters, but together they are formidable.

name: Jolo the Hero Scrat
description: 50% chance to avoid any damage.Gains Haste when summoned if your hand is full of Scrat cards.He's a bit of a showboat.

name: Nyrvir's Breath
description: Covers a large area with spiritfire, which burns all ground enemies.Accursed Ascension: Enemies that die in the fire join you as Skeletons.

name: Toll of the Dead
description: Summon an Undying Skeleton.After the second death, its remains linger on the field until..Accursed Ascension: Convert all remains left by this card into Undying Corpses.

name: Lone Scout
description: Mana Surge.If there are no other Friendly Minions when Lone Scout is Summoned, gain 1 Mana.She works best in a party of one.

name: Border Patrol
description: Mana Freeze (1).Summon 1 Crystal Sentry and 1 Crystal Arcanist.If you have only Crystal Elf units under your command, Border Patrol gains Shield.

name: Haunting Hugger
description: Haunts its target, giving it Cursed.When the target dies, the Hugger reappears to find a new target.All it wants in the afterlife is to give everyone a good haunting hug!

name: Nyrvir the Fallen
description:
Starts as Nyrvir Slumbers in your deck.Impactful Entry, Mythic.Nyrvir breathes spiritfire in a large area.
Swap This Card For Nyrvir Slumbers when played.

name: Spawn of Fury
description: Stuns a random friendly minion within the area, reduce its max Health and Damage by 33%, then summon a copy of it.

name: The Queen's Dragon
description: The mighty [mec:[r:Nyrvir]] enters the battlefield with [mec:[av:Nyrvir.MaxHealth] Max Health and [av:Nyrvir.Damage] Damage (Dps: [dps:Nyrvir])]

name: Drain Life
description: Drain 100 health from the closest enemy Minion, transfering it to MorelliaUnholy Bargain: Drain 100 health from the 2 closest enemy Minions, transfering it to Morellia

name: Spirit
description: Give a random friendly Minion Spirit (increases max Health).Unholy Bargain: Give 2 random friendly Minions Spirit (increases max Health).

name: Skeletons
description: [r:WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk1][mec:[r:WitchQueenPerk2]]: [r:WitchQueenBookEffect1DescriptionPerk2]

name: Forbidden Knowledge
description:
2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells costs 1 less until played.
Does not stack.Unholy Bargain: 2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells costs 2 less until played.
Does not stack.

name: Book of the Dead
description: Replace your hand with pages from the Book of the Dead

name: Slitherbound
description: Summon 1 Slitherbound Lancer and 1 Slitherbound Darter that inflicts Poison for 3 seconds on attack.Slitherbound get to choose their weapon, but not their chain mate.

name: Wreckinator 9000
description:
This metal monster will first slice and dice, then slam and bam.
At least until it Self-Destructs.Scrat engineering at its finest.

name: Caged Prowler
description:
After 20 seconds the cage releases the Prowler and falls apart.Preferring not to face the vicious beasts, Slitherbound typically just activate the cage and run away.
Fast.

name: Slithering Summons
description: Call Slitherbound.Summon a Living Statue, Prowler or Soul Stealer.Sacrifice: reduce mana cost by 1 for each Slitherbound you sacrifice.

name: Herald Ah'Mun
description:
Call Slitherbound (2).When Ah'Mun is about to die for the first time, Sacrifice: Heal 75 health for each Slitherbound sacrificed instead.The Eye of Xipetl grants its bearer eternal life.
At a cost...

name: Sewer Scrat
description: Barrel Shield.When Sewer Scrat is hit by melee attackers, it inflicts Poison for 3 seconds.

name: Scratillery
description: Fires 5 furry rockets that each summon a Scrat on impact.Scrat Swarm: Summoned Scrats gain Haste.

name: Boom Buggy
description: Rains a barrage of 6 missiles at random targets within range.Scrat Swarm: Gain Marksmanship.

name: Ritual of Servitude
description: Summon a random Minion Card with Mana cost equal to the lowest cost card that started in your deck other than this card, including other versions of this card.<size=20><color=#808080>The bindings of the Slither Lords are not easily broken.</color></size>

name: Woodsman
description: Revelry: gain Rage and give nearby enemy Minions Slow.As a three-time Mountain Games Timber Champion, he will chop through anything in his path.

name: High-Mage Leiliel
description: Mana Freeze (2), Mana Surge.While Mana Surge is active, Leiliel absorbs 50% of ranged attack damage and sends it back at attackers.

name: Leiliel's Vortex
description:
Mana Freeze (1).Pulls all Minions towards its center, dealing damage to enemies.
Damage is reduced the farther from the center they are.

name: Arcane Ring
description:
Mana Freeze (1).8 arcane projectiles circle a friendly Minion.
They deal damage to the first enemy they touch.Can only be cast in your own arena.

name: Glenn's Brew
description:
Give a friendly Minion +100 max health and heal it for 400.
After 6 seconds, the Minion mysteriously vanishes if it's still under your control.If the target is a Stoutheart, trigger its Revelry.

name: Caber Tosser
description: This powerful Stoutheart tosses his Caber at the first nearby enemy.Revelry: Gain another Caber.

name: Frostfeathers
description: Inflicts Slow on attack.These small pesky flyers barrage their victims with hail-like projectiles.

name: Fergus Flagon Fighter
description:
Wielding his famous bladed mugs, Fergus does a wild Spin-attack.
After the attack, Fergus gets dizzy and cannot attack or move for 5 seconds.Revelry: Refresh Fergus' attack.

name: Mountainshaper
description:
Strikes all enemies in a large area with an earthshattering Ground Rupture for each charge on Mountainshaper.Mountainshaper gains a charge for every 6 seconds it is in your hand.
(Max 5 charges).

name: Frostfeather Flyby
description: 11 Frostfeathers swoops down to perform one attack on a random enemy minion within the area before flying off.The Frostfeathers move at double speed and inflict Slow.

name: Mal'Shar Shadowfork
description: Stealth.Deals triple damage when attacking while Stealthed.When Mal'Shar kills an enemy Minion, give a random friendly Voidborne Minion Stealth and Netherstep it in a random direction.

name: Jade Flingers
description:
Growthburst Shroom.Jadespark Jungle is home to the most wondrous plantlife in the world.
The Mu-Hou protect it.

name: Ting, Teng & Tung
description:
These brothers count as a single Minion.
For every 33% health lost, one of them falls off.Each brother bombards enemies with Bounce Berries.

name: High Inquisitor Ardera
description: [r:ZealotLeaderFirst] burns [math:[v:DamageSelfOnAttack.SELF_DAMAGE_PERCENT]/[av:ZealotLeader.AttackCooldown]]% of her max health each second while attacking.Upon death, she grants [actorskillinfo:DivineShield,[mec:[r:DivineShield]]] and [actorskillinfo:RageBuff,[mec:[r:RageBuff]]] to 5 nearby friendly Minions.

name: Brother of the Burning Fist
description: Armor of Holy Fire.Clad in steel and holy purpose, The Burning Fist are unyielding and indomitable.

name: Jahun, Keeper of Jadespark
description: [actorskillinfo:MythicBuff,[mec:[r:MythicBuff]]].Pulls rocks from the earth and slams them back down, dealing 75 damage twice.When you play [r:Jahun], add a one-use Sunder card to the top of your deck.

name: Jadespark Watchers
description: Growthburst Shroom (2).Summon 2 Shi-Hou and 2 Mu-Hou.

name: Smite
description: Deal damage to ground Minions in an area.Empyrean Army: Set Holy Fire to the ground.

name: Ardent Aegis
description: Summon 2 Legionnaires and 2 Crossbow Dudes by a friendly ground Minion after a delay.Can only be cast in your own arena.Empyrean Army: Heal Minion for 250 health.

name: Windwalker Shi-Hou
description: When summoned, he performs a mighty Jump.The day a Windwalker finds a problem too big to vault is his last.

name: Shen's Shock Stick
description: Growthburst Shroom.Cast a Shock Rock for each charge on this.Gain a charge whenever you plant a Growthburst Shroom while this is in your hand (max 4).

name: Zealots of the Burning Fist
description: Burns 10% of their max health when they attack.If there is only one friendly Zealot in play, she gains Rage and Haste.

name: Lord Fanriel the Stormcharger
description: Mana Surge.When no enemies are near, Fanriel begins to Stormcharge.

name: Dormant Defenders
description: Summon 2 Crystal Constructs with Dormant.Awaken from Dormant state while you have Mana Surge.

name: Sugilite Shield
description: Mana Freeze (2)Minions within the barrier cannot take ranged damage from outside of the barrier.

name: Skeleton Crew
description: [actorskillinfo:AccursedAffinity,[mec:[r:AccursedAffinity]]]: Summon [cv:Skeletons.SummonAmounts*0] more [r:SkeletonUnits].

name: Resonating Blast Crystal
description: Deal damage in an area and drop a Blast Crystal.If you already have a Blast Crystal in play, instead detonate and destroy both.

name: Lady Infray the Spire Warden
description: Mana Surge.Every 3rd attack is a powerful Piercing Shot.
